description: Defines the INotesRepository interface which specifies methods for managing notes, including retrieving all notes, getting by ID, adding, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes as an enumerable collection.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its GUID identifier.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note and returns true if successful.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its GUID identifier.
